member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CONFIGURATION_PARAMS
member.summary: Represents video encoder rate control structure definitions for a structure.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CONFIGURATION_PARAMS.DataSize
member.summary: The data size of the provided rate control structure.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CONFIGURATION_PARAMS.pConfiguration_CQP
member.summary: A structure representing the rate control structure definition for constant quantization parameter mode.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CONFIGURATION_PARAMS.pConfiguration_CBR
member.summary: A structure representing the rate control structure definition for constant bitrate mode.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CONFIGURATION_PARAMS.pConfiguration_VBR
member.summary: A structure representing the rate control structure definition for variable bitrate mode.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CONFIGURATION_PARAMS.pConfiguration_QVBR
member.summary: A structure representing the rate control structure definition for constant quality target with constrained bitrate mode.
